div.formula: X Axis Title ZnO19 ZnO19-500V ZnO19-750-ox ZnO22 ZnO22-500V ZnO31 ZnO-met-5-O2 ZnO-met-20-O2 ZnO-met-50-O2 ZnO-cera-100-Ar MnZnO-ox5-Zn MnZnO-ox5-750-ox-Zn Mn005-1A Mn005-1A-micra Mn005-N-2A Mn005-O2-3A 9660 0.0 0.6 1.2 Y Axis Title X Axis Title ZnO19-750-ox ZnO19-500V ZnO19 9660 9720 1.2 Y Axis Title X Axis Title ZnO19 ZnO22 ZnO22-500V ZnO31
div.p: Contrary to the Mn K-edge, which results highly sensitive to the sample preparation method, not appreciable differences are found in several samples prepared under very different experimental conditions (different starting sputtering target (metal Zn; ceramic ZnO and different oxygen concentrations). Just very small differences appear in the post-growth annealed samples, where crystal quality improves and intensity of XANES features is slightly increased.
9640 9660 9680 9700 9720 9740 0.0 0.6 1.2 Y Axis Title X Axis Title MnZnO-ox5-Zn MnZnO-ox5-750-ox-Zn
A subtle difference is also found between sample Mn005-1A-micra and the others.
9700 1.2 Y Axis Title X Axis Title Mn005-1A Mn005-1A-micra Mn005-N-2A Mn005-O2-3A

figure.figDesc: 16 different samples (ZnO19, ZnO19-500V, ZnO19-750-ox, ZnO22, ZnO22-50V, ZnO31, ZnO-met-5-O 2 , ZnO-met-20-O 2 , ZnO-met-50-O 2 , ZnO-cera-100-Ar, MnZnO-ox5, MnZnO-ox5-750-O 2 , Mn005-1A, Mn005-1A-micra, Mn005-N
